name: Wire to frontend
description:
Wires backend to frontend for UI

# My Agent

scan through my backend, and dt_backend folder and simply wire up all the routers (py files) to the frontend. keep display and UI the same and style the same. creat new tabs/pages as needed but keep the full current style and theme across all pages.
